about_the_game:
Enjoy this unique story as an introduction to our full game – all for free. Dive into a climatic city-building experience with “Celestial Empire: Prologue,” where the land’s stunning nature mixes with traditional Chinese architecture. Be in charge of planning urban and rural structures by following your strategy. Watch it all grow from scratch into a dazzling bustling city worthy of hosting the almighty Emperor.

Main Features

  • Create and decorate your dream city
  • Design production chains
  • Rule and make decisions
  • Trade with other settlements
  • Watch the seasons change
  • Seek gods blessings
  • Work through upcoming disasters

name: Celestial Empire: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Embrace your duties as a new provincial governor. Experience the beauty of ancient China, design the city of your dreams, and take care of your people’s needs. Earn the Gods’ favor to maintain the Mandate of Heaven for the ruling dynasty.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
